meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rex Moroux Kate Jovin Kristin Robbins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7746.

td.p: Rex Moroux, a commercial real estate broker from Lafayette, Louisiana
Kate Jovin, a social worker from Somerville, Massachusetts
Kristin Robbins, an attorney from Red Bank, New Jersey (whose 2-day cash winnings total $44,994)

tr.td: SHAKESPEARE'S WOMEN
PLACES TO STAY IN VEGAS
EUROPEAN HISTORY
FURNITURE
WHAT DO YOU LOVE?
(RuPaul: With me, RuPaul. So contestants, start your engines and may the best player win.)
